attributes.action: raise the price of fuel tax to get unnecessary drivers off the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the government to raise the current levels of taxation on fuels within all UK territories. Petrol, Diesel, Heating Oil and Gas by at least 30%

The current state of pollution due to road vehicles makes the enviroment unsustainable. It is proposed that with a reduced number of private vehicles in use, public transport can be dramatically improved. The potential for these improvements is evidant in Ken Livingston's London reforms by introducing a congestion charge and by purchasing improved larger busses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
